title: Ticket #4553: Respecting MAX_JOBS_RUNNING
description:
** MAX_JOBS RUNNIING **

Support rust said it looks like we start up more jobs then we should and turn around and see our error and start randomly killing jobs to get within bounds.

Write a test which can submit in various sizes and not trip on a premature evicted without checkpoint.
remarks:
job_max_running is done but we don't honor MAX_JOBS_RUNNING in correct way. We blow past it and then shoot jobs in the head but not based on run time. This is a regression. V8_0_7 did not have this issue(Linux or Windows).

2015-Feb-27 10:42:21 by jfrey:
#4554 resolves this problem in HTCondor 8.2.8, and #4460 resolves it in HTCondor 8.3.x.
